summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a light-hearted topic. The email contains a confidentiality notice and mentions the potential tracking of communications. It highlights the personal relationship between the two individuals.

persons.name: Jes Staley

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email from Jes Staley and is also the sender of a previous email in the exchange.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are engaged in a friendly email exchange, indicating a personal relationship.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on July 9 and 10, 2010.
Jes Staley makes a light-hearted comment about tracking communications.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the owner of the communication.
There are redacted portions in the email indicating sensitive information.
